Package moa.gui

Class LookAndFeel

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.gui.LookAndFeel
  • public class LookAndFeel
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages setting the look and feel. Uses the KEY_LOOKANDFEEL property from GUIDefaults to determine what Look'n'Feel to use. See examples in the GUI.props file for more details.
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String CROSSPLATFORM_LNF
      the cross-platform LnF classname.
      static java.lang.String KEY_JIDELOOKANDFEEL
      the LnF for JIDE property in the GUI defaults.
      static java.lang.String KEY_LOOKANDFEEL
      the LnF property in the GUI defaults.
      protected static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER
      for logging output.
      static java.lang.String VALUE_CROSSPLATFORM
      for using the cross-platform LnF (= metal).
      static java.lang.String VALUE_SYSTEM
      for using the system's default LnF.
      static java.lang.String WINDOWS_LNF
      the Windows LnF classname.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected static boolean attemptInstallJavaLookAndFeel​(java.lang.String lnf)
      Attempts to install the specified Look'n'Feel, but falls back on cross-platform look if it fails.
      protected static boolean attemptInstallJideLookAndFeel​(int style)
      Attempts to install the specifoed JIDE style, but falls back on cross-platform Java Look'n'Feel and JIDE style LookAndFeelFactory.VSNET_STYLE_WITHOUT_MENU if it fails.
      static void install()
      Installs the look and feel.
      protected static boolean installJavaLookAndFeel​(java.lang.String lnf)
      Attempts to install the specified Java Look'n'Feel.
      protected static boolean installJideLookAndFeel​(int style)
      Attempts to install the specified JIDE style.

      • installJavaLookAndFeel

        protected static boolean installJavaLookAndFeel​(java.lang.String lnf)
        Attempts to install the specified Java Look'n'Feel.
        Parameters:
        lnf - the look'n'feel classname
        Returns:
        true if successfully installed

      • attemptInstallJavaLookAndFeel

        protected static boolean attemptInstallJavaLookAndFeel​(java.lang.String lnf)
        Attempts to install the specified Look'n'Feel, but falls back on cross-platform look if it fails.
        Parameters:
        lnf - the look'n'feel classname
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • installJideLookAndFeel

        protected static boolean installJideLookAndFeel​(int style)
        Attempts to install the specified JIDE style.
        Parameters:
        style - the style to install, uses default strategy if -1
        Returns:
        true if successful
        See Also:
        LookAndFeelFactory

      • attemptInstallJideLookAndFeel

        protected static boolean attemptInstallJideLookAndFeel​(int style)
        Attempts to install the specifoed JIDE style, but falls back on cross-platform Java Look'n'Feel and JIDE style LookAndFeelFactory.VSNET_STYLE_WITHOUT_MENU if it fails.
        Parameters:
        style - the style to install, uses default strategy if -1
        Returns:
        true if successful
        See Also:
        LookAndFeelFactory

      • install

        public static void install()
        Installs the look and feel.
